import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from 'react-tabs'; import 'react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css'; export const Chats = () => { return ( <>

) } export default Chats;
